Now how can use it outside anaconda? Like using pip command on my command prompt to install pytorch?

I am using sony laptop i3 processor which has some VGA graphics card i guess with windows 7.

There has to be a way to install it outside anaconda, because at my work place there's a security reason and anaconda will not work.
